鬹字的基本解释

鬹
guī
见“鬶”。

鬹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guī］
［《廣韻》居隋切，平支，見。］
“鬶1”的繁体字。
我国新石器时代陶制炊器。口若鸟喙，以便往外倒出，有把柄，有三空心足。是大汶口文化和龙山文化的代表器形之一。

鬹字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【鬲字部】　鬹； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1459第38
【廣韻】居隋切【集韻】均窺切，?音規。【說文】三足釜也。有柄喙。　又【集韻】俱爲切，音嬀。義同。　又【集韻】懸圭切，音攜。鑊也。通作鑴。

鬹字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

鬹字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guī］
["Guangyun" in Suiqie, flat branch, see. ]
Traditional characters for "鬶1".
my country's Neolithic pottery cookware. The mouth is like a bird's beak so that it can be poured out. It has a handle and three hollow feet. It is one of the representative forms of Dawenkou Culture and Longshan Culture.
Snipe
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji Chapter 1】【Tianzi Department】　鬹; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1459 Page 38
[Guang Yun] Ju Sui Qi [Ji Yun] are all peeked,? Sound rules. [Said the text] Three-legged kettle also. Stem beak.　 [Jiyun] All cut, sound Zhuo. The same meaning.　 [Ji Yun] Xuan Kyu cut, sound and carry. Wok also. Pass for 鑴.
